trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> class represents a configuration element for a service name used in a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> representa um elemento de configuração para um nome de serviço usado em um <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é usado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> está definida como `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property should be set to an appropriate value for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> instance to the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> propriedade deve ser definida como um valor apropriado para o aplicativo antes de chamar o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> método para adicionar o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> de instância para o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Service Provider Name (SPN) for this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o SPN (nome do provedor de serviços) para esta instância de <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the representation of SPN for this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém a representação de SPN para este <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instância.
